price: 你应当说：“我的养主啊！请你使我在一个吉祥的地方登陆，你是最会安置众生的。”
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
